title: High Business Entry Score
description: In 2024, Greece achieved a high overall score of 96.58 in the B-READY Business Entry index, indicating a strong environment for starting businesses.

title: Excellent Digital Public Services for Business
description: Greece scored 94.50 in 2024 for digital public services and transparency in business entry, showcasing its advanced digital infrastructure for businesses.

title: High Quality of Public Services for International Trade
description: In 2024, Greece scored 96.11 in the quality of public services for facilitating international trade, reflecting its strong support for international business activities.

title: High Tertiary Education Enrollment
description: Greece had a gross tertiary enrollment rate of 166.67% in 2022, indicating a high level of participation in higher education.

title: High Female Tertiary Education Enrollment
description: In 2022, Greece had a female gross tertiary enrollment rate of 171.99%, highlighting strong female participation in higher education.

title: High Male Tertiary Education Enrollment
description: Greece's male gross tertiary enrollment rate was 161.73% in 2022, showing significant male participation in higher education.

title: Low Growth in Agriculture Sector
description: In 2023, Greece experienced a significant decline in the agriculture, forestry, and fishing sectors with a growth rate of -26.83%.

title: Low Number of Children Out of School
description: In 2022, only 13 primary school-aged children were out of school in Greece, representing a very low percentage of 0.00218%.

title: High Specialist Surgical Workforce
description: As of 2015, Greece had 163.54 specialist surgical professionals per 100,000 population, indicating a strong healthcare workforce.
